Chinese: 我问我们嘉宾的第一个问题就是，

English: Tony has a proven track record of listening and understanding business needs,
partnering with senior leadership on workforce planning, strategic recruitment initiatives, execution, and delivery.
The first question I asked our guest was,
can you talk about your experience in using digital communication technologies to find and recruit talent?
Chinese: 托尼拥有经证实的倾听并理解业务需求的业绩记录，
并与高级管理层在人员规划、战略性招聘举措、执行及交付方面协作。
我问嘉宾的第一个问题是，
你能否谈谈你在运用数字通信技术寻才和招才方面的经验？

English: Tony has a proven track record of listening and understanding business needs, partnering with senior leadership on workforce planning, strategic recruitment initiatives, execution, and delivery.
The first question I asked our guest was, can you talk about your experience in using digital communication technologies to find and recruit talent?
Chinese: 托尼拥有经证实的倾听并理解业务需求的能力，并能与高层领导就人力资源规划、战略性招聘项目、执行与交付等方面开展合作。
我向嘉宾提出的第一问题是：你能否谈谈自己在利用数字通信技术发掘和招募人才方面的经验？

input: Tony has a proven track record of listening and understanding business needs, partnering with senior leadership on workforce planning, strategic recruitment initiatives, execution, and delivery. The first question I asked our guest was, can you talk about your experience in using digital communication technologies to find and recruit talent?
